    • Field Detail

      • COMMON_SUPPRESS_REGEXP

        public static final java.lang.String COMMON_SUPPRESS_REGEXP
        Common part of regexp for suppressing in line comments for different languages. Comment start prefix isn't included, e.g. add '//' for Java/C/JS or '#' for Ruby
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
